summary: Three cops team up to bring down a criminal gang of seven, who have their own hidden agenda.
cast: Nicholas Tse|Jaycee Chan|Shawn Yue|Jing Wu|Lisa Lu|Andy On|Candy Liu|Elanne Kong|Sam Lee|Ken Lo|Vincent Sze|Xue Mei Wang|Ka Wah Lam|Tak-Bun Wong|Mark Cheng|Philip Ng|Deep Ng|Tommy Yuen|Gladys Fung|Suet Lam|Anson Leung|Terence Tsui|Chi Wai Wong|Siu Yik Ng|Wai Nam Chan|Tsz Fung Ma|Yau Quan Au|Kai Kit Lee|Tao Chiang|Ivy Pang|Tin Chi Law|May Wong|Wai-Ha Lee|Chi-Wai Lai|Norman Chan|Shuet Kwan Cheung|Pok-yee Ng|Chun-Ho Tam|Shannon Chan|Moon Moon Chan|Chun Wai Yeung|Chin Nam Yeung|Mei Yin Law|Chin Kwong Law|Miu Sze Lau|Ka-hei Chan|Fu-Keung Chan|Kit Yui Tsang|Wing Chi Cheng|Man Ho Tong|Man-Lok Kwok|Yee-Man Yuen|Wang Yue Chin|Lim-Kang Chow|Hiu Wah Chan|Hin-Wai Au|Nic Yan|Tat-Kwong Chan|Candy Cheung|Samuel Pang|Chi-Wang Wong
title: Invisible Target
